turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello there, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what coffee place did you want to orde from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, and what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. what drink do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say you want soy milk for the drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what drink did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i'm sorry, i'm not sure i understand. did you say you want to order soy milk from starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 soy milk from starbucks on fourth street in colorado springs.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did i get that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $2.00 is your total. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ah, okay. Sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. it will be ready for pick up in 9 minutes. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, okay. Thank you the same.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: enjoy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. Have a nice day.
